Using this trading plan, Eric Schmidt can diversify his investment portfolio and can spread stock trades out over a period of one year to reduce market impact, Google said. ''Because this trading plan was established well in advance of a trade, it also helps avoid concerns about whether Eric Schmidt had material, non-public information when he made a decision to sell his stock.
